content: {"locationId": "7800", "organizationId": "6486", "name": "The Shepherd's Table", "address1": "1412 Gamecock Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Conway", "state": "SC", "zipCode": "29526", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.83382", "longitude": "-79.05424", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program, Online Market, Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "The Shepherd's Table is a 501(c)3 nonprofit organization. Our mission is to provide food and resources to our neighbors in need. We operate under the core values of selflessly and humbly going the extra mile to provide our guests equitable, supportive, and encouraging service. In our community kitchen we provide nutritious hot meals daily throughout the week, we operate a full choice food pantry, and we provide referrals to other agencies that may be able to provide the resources that our neighbors need. Each year we provide over 30,000 hot meals and fresh nutritious food to prepare at home for 6,000 families, and we help thousands of our neighbors connect with local resources.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "843-488-3663", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Online Ordering, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Other, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Sit Down Meals, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 56, "regionName": "Lowcountry Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "5fb3a382-bcd1-479f-a540-43f27ab71b53.png", "website": "https://lowcountryfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Sunday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (Submit orders Tuesday at 8am through Thursday at 10pm)", "Monday 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (Lunch)", "Monday 4:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner)", "Tuesday 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (Lunch)", "Tuesday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Tuesday 4:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner)", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-1:00 PM (Seniors (60+) & Physically Disabled Individuals Only)", "Wednesday 10:00 AM-1:00 PM (Seniors (60+) & Physically Disabled Individuals Only)", "Wednesday 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (Lunch)", "Wednesday 4:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner)", "Thursday 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (Lunch)", "Thursday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 1:00 PM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 4:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner)", "Friday 11:30 AM-12:30 PM (Lunch)", "Friday 4:00 PM-5:30 PM (Dinner)", "Friday 7:00 PM-11:30 PM (Submit orders Tuesday at 8am through Thursday at 10pm)", "Saturday 12:00 AM-11:30 PM (Submit orders Tuesday at 8am through Thursday at 10pm)", "Saturday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM [ 3rd week(s)]"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
